short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Resolve TLAs directly in the pages with this extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
No one likes TLAs, so with this extension, you can resole those pesky TLAs directly from the comfort of your browser. Right here and now.

Version 1.0.2 Release notes:
- Automated version building
- Show a badge when working
- Better Icons
- Code cleanup

Version 1.0.1 Release notes:
- Non greedy regexp
- Uses local storage
- No overriding of TLAs definition on install of a new version
